verses.name: Hosea 2:1
verses.text: Say ye unto your brethren, Ammi; and to your sisters, Ru–hamah.

verses.name: Hosea 2:2
verses.text: Plead with your mother, plead: for she is not my wife, neither am I her husband: let her therefore put away her whoredoms out of her sight, and her adulteries from between her breasts;

verses.name: Hosea 2:3
verses.text: Lest I strip her naked, and set her as in the day that she was born, and make her as a wilderness, and set her like a dry land, and slay her with thirst.

verses.name: Hosea 2:4
verses.text: And I will not have mercy upon her children; for they be the children of whoredoms.
